title: Orientation & Introduction
description: Welcome to the Federal Candidate Simulator — AI Edition. This simulator will take you through the entire election cycle, one step at a time. You’ll experience the real requirements of filing, fundraising, compliance, and campaigning — all safely in a simulation.
readingSummary: Candidate Coins (CC) are worth $100 simulated each. You start with 50 CC.
Signatures & voter approval: each quiz score equals the same number of signatures. 100 signatures = 1% approval.
Ballot access: pay CC (filing fee) AND gather enough signatures.
Eligibility thresholds: President 75 CC + 2.5% approval; Senate 50 CC + 2.5%; House 31 CC + 2.5%
Task types: Read, Write, Upload, Speak
After each task, CC, signatures, and approval are updated. All choices carry forward.

tasks.prompt: Quiz: What does 1 Candidate Coin (CC) represent?

questions.question: What does 1 CC equal in simulated campaign funds?
